content: a cute little winter hat with a bit of a nordic flair thanks to the classic stranded pattern it knits up quickly in a worsted weight yarn and offers endless color options it s worked top-down which makes adjusting for personal taste quite easy add more rounds before the stranded pattern for a slouchier look or cut out some rounds if you want the hat to be more close fitting also depth of the ribbing is a matter of taste i usually like a deeper ribbing for a snug fit especially for the kids *note on yarns * the purple hat has been worked in fingering weight shetland yarn held double which worked up to perfect gauge german version is here https //soozasknitting de/free-patterns/snow-stars-hat-deutsch-free
